articles.description: With video calling become the rule rather than the exception in a Covid-infected world, Google has spruced its video calling Google Duo app. And has released an ad showcasing it. Does it get the message across? Totally.

articles.title: Is Apple considering a massive shift of iPhone manufacturing from China to India? - Republic World - Republic World
articles.description: Apple is looking to move a fifth of its iPhone production from China to India; however, certain conditions under PLI scheme could be problematic for it.
articles.content: Over the past couple of months, Apple has reportedly been in conversations with several top government officials in India that have been geared towards shifting about a fifth of its iPhone capacity from China to India over the course of next five years. Accor… [+2490 chars]

articles.title: Windows Phone is what we need today as an alternative to Android, iOS - India Today
articles.description: Microsoft’s mobile operating system may be long dead but it is exactly what we need as an alternative to Android’s monopoly in a world that cares for privacy.
